ch0335_00_hassaku/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I look
forward to seeing you do your best
today—as always!
ch0335_00_hassaku/0101_0701_02_10:
You and your Pokémon are still growing.
I look forward to seeing where your path
takes you!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7101_0701_01_10:
A teacher is supposed to be a role model
for students.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7101_0701_02_10:
However...when I watch my students grow,
I learn things too.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7101_0701_03_10: That’s why I can never quit teaching!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7102_0701_01_10:
It’s a bit embarrassing, but when something
moves me deeply, sometimes I sob
uncontrollably.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7102_0701_02_10:
In particular, when a student of mine shows
tremendous growth and surpasses me,
I—I just...
ch0335_00_hassaku/7102_0701_03_10:
BWUUUH huh huh! I’b so habby just thinking
aboub it!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7103_0701_01_10:
Beauty isn’t the kind of thing you should
force into a box and score.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7103_0701_02_10:
That goes for paintings, sculptures...and
for some people, even their bonds with
Pokémon!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7103_0701_03_10:
Seek what YOU think is beautiful—together
with your partner Pokémon.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7104_0701_01_10:
Strong Trainers from all over are gathered
here on Pasio. Thrilling, isn’t it?
ch0335_00_hassaku/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s like a trial by dragon’s fire! If you make
it through, your future’s wide open!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7104_0701_03_10:
You would be wise to keep training hard.
It will save you from experiencing bitter
regret.
ch0335_00_hassaku/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], if you
encounter a sync pair on Pasio you
think is beautiful...
ch0335_00_hassaku/7105_0701_02_10:
ask yourself why you feel that way. Observe
them closely, and think!
ch0335_00_hassaku/7105_0701_03_10:
Asking questions and digging deeper is
important—for art and for academics!
ch0335_00_hassaku/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a gift for you, the young
up-and-comer!
ch0335_00_hassaku/1701_0702_01_10:
Young sprouts truly do grow with astounding
speed, yes...
ch0335_00_hassaku/1701_0702_02_10:
I look forward to seeing the flowers
you’ll bloom!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2501_0701_01_10:
It could be said that one doesn’t need art
to survive...
ch0335_00_hassaku/2501_0701_02_10:
But it certainly makes surviving much
more enjoyable!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2501_0701_03_10:
If the things I teach you can bring even a
little more color to your life, I’ll be happy.
ch0335_00_hassaku/2501_0702_01_10:
Don’t think it’s a waste of time to learn
things that aren’t strictly necessary.
ch0335_00_hassaku/2501_0702_02_10: Learning is the trick to a long, fulfilling life!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2511_0701_01_10:
There’s a saying: “Knowing a skill will help
in your time of need.”
ch0335_00_hassaku/2511_0701_02_10:
It doesn’t matter if it’s something you’re good
at or just something you’re interested in.
Develop those skills!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2511_0701_03_10:
The day will come when they come
in handy!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2511_0702_01_10:
Life is interesting because you can’t predict
what’s going to happen!
ch0335_00_hassaku/2511_0702_02_10:
The day your hidden talent blooms may not
be far off!
ch0335_00_hassaku/3001_0701_01_10:
Go ahead—take in and feel the beauty of
this crisp, morning air!
ch0335_00_hassaku/3003_0701_01_10:
Your passion for studying is impressive. But
youth is the only time when you can play
without a care in the world!
ch0335_00_hassaku/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done today! I think someone who works
this hard deserves a little treasure from the
dragon’s hoard.
